clinical_study.brief_title: The Study of Targeted NY-ESO-1 T Cell Receptor (TCR) Genetic Modified Autologous T Cells Treatment of Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: The Study of Targeted NY-ESO-1 T Cell Receptor (TCR) Genetic Modified Autologous T Cells Treatment of Advanced Solid Tumors

primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of randomization until the date of date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 36 months

arm_group.description: Peripheral blood mononuclear cells collected: draw 100-150 ml of peripheral blood in patients and separate of the peripheral blood mononuclear cells, the total number of cells 1.5 * 10 ^ 7 / kg - 1 * 10 ^ 8 / kg Fludarabine 25 mg/m2 + NS 250 ml, ivgtt qdx5d, CTX 60 mg/kg + NS 250 ml, ivgtt qd x2d, should be in front of the TCR - T cells infusion of 4 days reinfusion the total number of T cells （1* 10 ^ 8 / kg - 10 * 10 ^ 8 / kg） in 3 days , infusion 10-15 minutes, should not be more than 20 minutes.

intervention.description: Low dose group: 1 x 10 ^8 /kg T cell total reinfusion. High dose groups: 10 x 10 ^ 8 / kgT cell total reinfusion.
